pmlib_sysconfig.h File Reference
System Configuration

This file declares the interface for the system configuration for switching on or switching off modules or putting them in HW controlled Auto Clock Gated mode. More...

#include <ti/drv/pm/include/pm_types.h>
#include <ti/drv/pm/include/prcm/pmhal_prcm.h>

Data Structures

struct  pmlibSysConfigPowerStateParams
 Structure to define the system configuration Table for a module. More...
 
struct  pmlibSysConfigErrReturn
 Structure to help the user understand if the module configuration was successful or not. If it is a failure the reason for the failure is also returned. More...
 
struct  pmlibSysConfigDetailedState
 Structure to help the user get the more detailed power mode in the PMLIBSysConfigGetPowerState API. More...
 

Macros

#define PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_MAX_RESET_CONFIG   (3U)
 Maximum number of configurable reset lines for a module.
 

Typedefs

  PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_MIN = 0U, PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_DISABLED = PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_MIN, PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_AUTO_CG = 1U, PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_ALWAYS_ENABLED = 2U,
  PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_MAX = PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_ALWAYS_ENABLED, PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_COUNT = PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_MAX + 1U, PMLIB_SYS_CONFIG_INVALID = 0x7FFFFFFF
}

Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for the system configuration for switching on or switching off modules or putting them in HW controlled Auto Clock Gated mode.
